icd10_codes.description: Cerebral infarction due to embolism of right middle cerebral artery
icd10_codes.evidence: CT perfusion reveals salvageable penumbra in the right MCA territory
Past medical history includes atrial fibrillation (not on anticoagulation)

icd10_codes.description: Hemiplegia, unspecified affecting right dominant side
icd10_codes.evidence: left hemiparesis (2/5 strength upper and lower extremities)
Physical exam reveals left facial droop

icd10_codes.description: Introduction of Other Thrombolytic into Peripheral Vein, Percutaneous Approach
